fields.name: Aggressive goal:
fields.value: Target a player. Attack them and reduce their score every evening by 7.5% until you die.

fields.name: Red card (Passive):
fields.value: Attack non-unseen visitors with your Attack Power

fields.name: Used to 'Roids (Passive):
fields.value: If your score is less than 50%, increase it by 2/10ths, up to 50%.

fields.name: Serious Demeanor (Passive):
fields.value: You cannot be roleblocked or affected by abilities during the day phase.
